function.description:
Runs an application and returns the output.
The result will contain a list of errors, a list of output and the runtime in milliseconds. When the application exits with a non-zero exit coe this will be logged to the console. The directory parameter is the working directory where you would like the command to be executed.

example.title: Usage
Usage
example.header: Copying a file in a specified working directory. In this specific example, the working directory is specified by C:/tmp. The source file source.jpg is copied and the name of the new file is target.jpg. The copy, i.e. target.jpg, is created in the specified working directory, in this case C:/tmp.
